snippet.title: Shadows of the Forgotten Trailer
snippet.description:
In a long-abandoned mansion of Dr. Victor Grimm, players find themselves trapped after a sudden collapse of the mansion's entrance. As they explore the sprawling, decaying building, they uncover secrets, and disturbing relics of Dr. Grimm's experiments.

🎮 Join Our Official Discord! 🚀

Want to be part of the shades of play community? Join our official Discord server to stay connected with the dev team and fellow players!

✅ Get exclusive updates & sneak peeks 👀
✅ Chat with developers & share feedback 💬
✅ Participate in events, giveaways, and Q&As 🎉

https://discord.com/invite/SJuEf85BHq
